mapper.select: SELECT AA.EA_SUBJECT EA_SUBJECT ,AA.EA_INSERTDATE EA_INSERTDATE ,AA.EA_NO EA_NO ,AA.EA_LINENO EA_LINENO ,AA.EA_STATUS EA_STATUS ,AA.EA_SUBJECT EA_SUBJECT ,AA.EA_STEPNO EA_STEPNO FROM (SELECT TO_CHAR(B.EA_INSERTDATE,'YYYY-MM-DD') EA_INSERTDATE ,C.EA_NO EA_NO ,C.EA_LINENO EA_LINENO ,C.EA_STEPNO EA_STEPNO ,C.EA_STATUS EA_STATUS ,B.EA_SUBJECT EA_SUBJECT FROM (SELECT A.* FROM EA_TABLE A WHERE A.EA_NEXTEMNO=#{emno, jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND A.EA_STATUS IN('01','02') ORDER BY A.EA_NO DESC)B ,EA_LOG C WHERE C.EA_LOGNO=B.EA_LOGNO ORDER BY B.EA_INSERTDATE DESC) AA WHERE ROWNUM <= 5

/* 전체리스트 */ SELECT * FROM( SELECT B.EA_STATUS EA_STATUS ,A.EA_NO EA_NO ,A.EA_STEPNO EA_STEPNO ,A.EA_LINENO EA_LINENO ,A.EA_LOGNO EA_LOGNO ,A.EA_FINALDATE EA_FINALDATE ,TO_CHAR(B.EA_INSERTDATE,'YYYY-MM-DD') EA_INSERTDATE ,B.EA_EMPNO EA_EMPNO ,B.EA_SUBJECT EA_SUBJECT ,C.EMNAME EMNAME FROM EA_LOG A ,EA_TABLE B ,(SELECT C.EMNAME EMNAME FROM EM_INFO C WHERE C.EMNO=#{emno, jdbcType=VARCHAR}) C WHERE B.EA_EMPNO=#{emno, jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND A.EA_LOGNO=B.EA_LOGNO AND (B.EA_STATUS IN('01', '02', '03', '04', '05', '07', '06')) ORDER BY B.EA_INSERTDATE DESC ) WHERE ROWNUM <= 5

/* 04함 */ SELECT * FROM( SELECT B.EA_STATUS EA_STATUS ,A.EA_NO EA_NO ,A.EA_STEPNO EA_STEPNO ,A.EA_LINENO EA_LINENO ,A.EA_LOGNO EA_LOGNO ,A.EA_FINALDATE EA_FINALDATE ,TO_CHAR(B.EA_INSERTDATE,'YYYY-MM-DD') EA_INSERTDATE ,B.EA_EMPNO EA_EMPNO ,B.EA_SUBJECT EA_SUBJECT ,C.EMNAME EMNAME FROM EA_LOG A ,EA_TABLE B ,(SELECT C.EMNAME EMNAME FROM EM_INFO C WHERE C.EMNO=#{emno, jdbcType=VARCHAR}) C WHERE B.EA_EMPNO=#{emno, jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND A.EA_LOGNO=B.EA_LOGNO AND (B.EA_STATUS IN('04')) ORDER BY B.EA_INSERTDATE DESC ) WHERE ROWNUM <= 5

/* 완료함 */ SELECT * FROM( SELECT B.EA_STATUS EA_STATUS ,A.EA_NO EA_NO ,A.EA_STEPNO EA_STEPNO ,A.EA_LINENO EA_LINENO ,A.EA_LOGNO EA_LOGNO ,A.EA_FINALDATE EA_FINALDATE ,TO_CHAR(B.EA_INSERTDATE,'YYYY-MM-DD') EA_INSERTDATE ,B.EA_EMPNO EA_EMPNO ,B.EA_SUBJECT EA_SUBJECT ,C.EMNAME EMNAME FROM EA_LOG A ,EA_TABLE B ,(SELECT C.EMNAME EMNAME FROM EM_INFO C WHERE C.EMNO=#{emno, jdbcType=VARCHAR}) C WHERE B.EA_EMPNO=#{emno, jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND A.EA_LOGNO=B.EA_LOGNO AND (B.EA_STATUS IN('03')) ORDER BY B.EA_INSERTDATE DESC ) WHERE ROWNUM <= 5

/* 진행함 */ SELECT * FROM( SELECT B.EA_STATUS EA_STATUS ,A.EA_NO EA_NO ,A.EA_STEPNO EA_STEPNO ,A.EA_LINENO EA_LINENO ,A.EA_LOGNO EA_LOGNO ,A.EA_FINALDATE EA_FINALDATE ,TO_CHAR(B.EA_INSERTDATE,'YYYY-MM-DD') EA_INSERTDATE ,B.EA_EMPNO EA_EMPNO ,B.EA_SUBJECT EA_SUBJECT ,C.EMNAME EMNAME FROM EA_LOG A ,EA_TABLE B ,(SELECT C.EMNAME EMNAME FROM EM_INFO C WHERE C.EMNO=#{emno, jdbcType=VARCHAR}) C WHERE B.EA_EMPNO=#{emno, jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND A.EA_LOGNO=B.EA_LOGNO AND (B.EA_STATUS IN('01', '02')) ORDER BY B.EA_INSERTDATE DESC ) WHERE ROWNUM <= 5
SELECT A.* ,B.* ,C.* FROM EM_INFO A ,EM_DEPARTMENT B ,EM_JOB C WHERE EMNO=#{emno, jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND A.DEPTCD=B.DEPTCD AND A.JOBCD=C.JOBCD

SELECT A.EMNO EMNO ,A.EMNAME EMNAME ,A.EMID EMID ,A.EMPW EMPW ,A.EMHIREDATE EMHIREDATE ,A.DEPTCD DEPTCD ,A.EMPIC EMPIC ,B.DEPTNAME DEPTNAME ,A.JOBCD JOBCD ,C.JOBNAME JOBNAME ,A.EMEMAIL EMEMAIL ,A.EMHP EMHP ,A.EMDINO EMDINO ,A.EMEXNO EMEXNO ,A.EMSIGN EMSIGN ,A.EMINSERTDATE EMINSERTDATE ,A.EMUPDATEDATE EMUPDATEDATE FROM EM_INFO A, EM_DEPARTMENT B, EM_JOB C WHERE A.EMID = #{emid, jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND A.EMPW = #{empw, jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND A.DEPTCD = B.DEPTCD AND A.JOBCD = C.JOBCD

SELECT A.EA_DOCCD EA_DOCCD ,A.EA_LINENO EA_LINENO ,A.EA_NO EA_NO ,A.EA_SUBJECT EA_SUBJECT ,A.EA_MEMO EA_MEMO ,A.EA_EMPNO EA_EMPNO ,A.EA_FILEUPLOAD EA_FILEUPLOAD ,A.EA_INSERTDATE EA_INSERTDATE ,B.EA_FINALDATE EA_FINALDATE ,B.EA_LOGNO EA_LOGNO ,B.EA_LINENO EA_LINENO ,B.EA_STEPNO EA_STEPNO ,A.EA_STATUS EA_STATUS ,B.EA_SIGN EA_SIGN ,B.EA_SIGN1 EA_SIGN1 ,B.EA_SIGN2 EA_SIGN2 ,B.EA_FILE EA_FILE ,B.EA_FILE1 EA_FILE1 ,B.EA_FILE2 EA_FILE2 ,C.EMNAME EMNAME ,C.EA_EMPNO EA_EMPNO ,C.JOBCD JOBCD ,C.JOBNAME JOBNAME ,C.DEPTCD DEPTCD ,C.DEPTNAME DEPTNAME ,D.EMNAME1 EMNAME1 ,D.EA_EMPNO1 EA_EMPNO1 ,D.JOBCD1 JOBCD1 ,D.JOBNAME1 JOBNAME1 ,D.DEPTCD1 DEPTCD1 ,D.DEPTNAME1 DEPTNAME1 ,E.EMNAME2 EMNAME2 ,E.EA_EMPNO2 EA_EMPNO2 ,E.JOBCD2 JOBCD2 ,E.JOBNAME2 JOBNAME2 ,E.DEPTCD2 DEPTCD2 ,E.DEPTNAME2 DEPTNAME2 FROM EA_TABLE A ,EA_LOG B ,(SELECT A.EMNAME AS EMNAME ,B.EA_EMPNO AS EA_EMPNO ,A.JOBCD AS JOBCD ,A.DEPTCD AS DEPTCD ,C.JOBNAME AS JOBNAME ,D.DEPTNAME AS DEPTNAME FROM EM_INFO A ,EA_STEP B ,EM_JOB C ,EM_DEPARTMENT D WHERE A.EMNO=B.EA_EMPNO AND A.DEPTCD=D.DEPTCD AND A.JOBCD=C.JOBCD AND B.EA_STEPNO=#{ea_stepno, jdbcType=VARCHAR})C ,(SELECT A.EMNAME AS EMNAME1 ,B.EA_EMPNO1 AS EA_EMPNO1 ,A.JOBCD AS JOBCD1 ,A.DEPTCD AS DEPTCD1 ,C.JOBNAME AS JOBNAME1 ,D.DEPTNAME AS DEPTNAME1 FROM EM_INFO A ,EA_STEP B ,EM_JOB C ,EM_DEPARTMENT D WHERE A.EMNO=B.EA_EMPNO1 AND A.DEPTCD=D.DEPTCD AND A.JOBCD=C.JOBCD AND B.EA_STEPNO=#{ea_stepno, jdbcType=VARCHAR})D ,(SELECT A.EMNAME AS EMNAME2 ,B.EA_EMPNO2 AS EA_EMPNO2 ,A.JOBCD AS JOBCD2 ,A.DEPTCD AS DEPTCD2 ,C.JOBNAME AS JOBNAME2 ,D.DEPTNAME AS DEPTNAME2 FROM EM_INFO A ,EA_STEP B ,EM_JOB C ,EM_DEPARTMENT D WHERE A.EMNO=B.EA_EMPNO2 AND A.DEPTCD=D.DEPTCD AND A.JOBCD=C.JOBCD AND B.EA_STEPNO=#{ea_stepno, jdbcType=VARCHAR})E WHERE A.EA_NO=#{ea_no, jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND A.EA_LOGNO=B.EA_LOGNO AND (C.EA_EMPNO=#{emno, jdbcType=VARCHAR} OR D.EA_EMPNO1=#{emno, jdbcType=VARCHAR} OR E.EA_EMPNO2=#{emno, jdbcType=VARCHAR})

/* 채번 쿼리 */ SELECT CASE WHEN MAX(SUBSTR(A.EA_LINENO,-4)) IS NULL THEN TO_CHAR(1) ELSE TO_CHAR(MAX(SUBSTR(A.EA_LINENO,-4))+1) END EA_LINENO FROM EA_LINE A WHERE SUBSTR(A.EA_LINENO,4,8)=TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'YYYYMMDD')

/* 채번 쿼리 */ SELECT CASE WHEN MAX(SUBSTR(A.EA_STEPNO,-4)) IS NULL THEN TO_CHAR(1) ELSE TO_CHAR(MAX(SUBSTR(A.EA_STEPNO,-4))+1) END EA_STEPNO FROM EA_STEP A WHERE SUBSTR(A.EA_STEPNO,7,8)=TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'YYYYMMDD')
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO EA_STEP ( EA_STEPNO ,EA_EMPNO ,EA_EMPNO1 ,EA_EMPNO2 ,EA_LINENO ) VALUES ( #{ea_stepno, jdbcType=VARCHAR} --스텝번호 ,#{ea_empno, jdbcType=VARCHAR} -- 이상훈 (기안자) ,#{ea_empno1, jdbcType=VARCHAR} -- 차은우 (1차결재자) ,#{ea_empno2, jdbcType=VARCHAR} -- 박성웅 (2차결재자) ,#{ea_lineno, jdbcType=VARCHAR} --결재라인번호 )

INSERT INTO EA_TABLE ( EA_DOCCD ,EA_LINENO ,EA_LOGNO ,EA_NO ,EA_MEMO ,EA_FILEUPLOAD ,EA_EMPNO ,EA_SUBJECT ,EA_INSERTDATE ,EA_STATUS ,EA_NEXTEMNO ) VALUES ( #{ea_doccd, jdbcType=VARCHAR} --문서양식코드 ,#{ea_lineno, jdbcType=VARCHAR} --결재LINE번호 ,#{ea_logno, jdbcType=VARCHAR} --로그번호 ,#{ea_no, jdbcType=VARCHAR} --전자결재번호 ,#{ea_memo, jdbcType=VARCHAR} --메모 ,#{ea_fileupload, jdbcType=VARCHAR} --파일업로드 ,#{ea_empno, jdbcType=VARCHAR} --작성자사번 ,#{ea_subject, jdbcType=VARCHAR} --전자결재제목 ,SYSDATE ,#{ea_status, jdbcType=VARCHAR} --전자결재상태 ,#{ea_nextemno, jdbcType=VARCHAR} --전자다음결재자 )
